rooms.description: Two-car garage with ample parking space and electric charging station.
Modern living room with expansive windows for natural light following Vastu principles.
Contemporary dining area integrated into the open living space.
Luxury kitchen with modern appliances and ample storage, aligned with Vastu guidelines for east-facing kitchen.
Ensuite bathroom for the living area master suite (see level one).

openings.description: Grand entrance with modern design elements.
Automated garage door for convenient access.
